name: Blockquote

context.body: It was a large room, heavily outfitted with the usual badly ventilated furnaces, rows of bubbling crucibles, and one stuffed alligator. Things floated in jars. The air smelled of a limited life expectancy.
context.footer: <footer>Emily Dickinson, <cite>I felt a funeral in my brain</cite></footer>

notes: For pull quotes. Suited for more serious articles

variants.name: Wellcome Bold
variants.notes: For pull quotes. Suited for more informal articles
